verses.verse: כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD שִׁמְר֥וּ <WH8104> Keep מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> ye judgment וַעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> and do צְדָקָ֑ה <WH6666> justice כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קְרוֹבָ֤ה <WH7138> [is] near יְשֽׁוּעָתִי֙ <WH3444> for my salvation לָב֔וֹא <WH935> to come וְצִדְקָתִ֖י <WH6666> and my righteousness לְהִגָּלֽוֹת׃ <WH1540> to be revealed

אַשְׁרֵ֤י <WH835> Blessed אֱנוֹשׁ֙ <WH376> who יַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> [that] doeth זֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וּבֶן־ <WH1121> this and the son אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man יַחֲזִ֣יק <WH2388> [that] layeth hold בָּ֑הּ שֹׁמֵ֤ר <WH8104> on it that keepeth שַׁבָּת֙ <WH7676> the sabbath מֵֽחַלְּל֔וֹ <WH2490> from polluting וְשֹׁמֵ֥ר <WH8104> it and keepeth יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand מֵעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> from doing כָּל־ <WH3605> any רָֽע׃ <WH7451> any evil ס

וְאַל־ <WH408> Nor יֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> speak בֶּן־ <WH1121> Neither let the son הַנֵּכָ֗ר <WH5236> of the stranger הַנִּלְוָ֤ה <WH3867> that hath joined אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> himself to the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הַבְדֵּ֧ל <WH914> hath utterly יַבְדִּילַ֛נִי <WH914> separated יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> me from his people וְאַל־ <WH408> Nor יֹאמַר֙ <WH559> say הַסָּרִ֔יס <WH5631> neither let the eunuch הֵ֥ן <WH2005> Behold אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> tree יָבֵֽשׁ׃ <WH3002> Behold I [am] a dry ס

כִּי־ <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD לַסָּֽרִיסִים֙ <WH5631> unto the eunuchs אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יִשְׁמְרוּ֙ <WH8104> that keep אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבְּתוֹתַ֔י <WH7676> my sabbaths וּבָֽחֲר֖וּ <WH977> and choose בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what חָפָ֑צְתִּי <WH2654> [the things] that please וּמַחֲזִיקִ֖ים <WH2388> me and take hold בִּבְרִיתִֽי׃ <WH1285> of my covenant

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <WH5414> Even unto them will I give לָהֶ֜ם בְּבֵיתִ֤י <WH1004> in mine house וּבְחֽוֹמֹתַי֙ <WH2346> and within my walls יָ֣ד <WH3027> a place וָשֵׁ֔ם <WH8034> and a name ט֖וֹב <WH2896> better מִבָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> than of sons וּמִבָּנ֑וֹת <WH1323> and of daughters שֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> name עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> them an everlasting אֶתֶּן־ <WH5414> I will give ל֔וֹ אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִכָּרֵֽת׃ <WH3772> that shall not be cut off ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> Also the sons הַנֵּכָ֗ר <WH5236> of the stranger הַנִּלְוִ֤ים <WH3867> that join עַל־ <WH5921> and יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> themselves to the LORD לְשָׁ֣רְת֔וֹ <WH8334> to serve וּֽלְאַהֲבָה֙ <WH157> him and to love אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> the name יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become ל֖וֹ לַעֲבָדִ֑ים <WH5650> to be his servants כָּל־ <WH3605> every שֹׁמֵ֤ר <WH8104> every one that keepeth שַׁבָּת֙ <WH7676> the sabbath מֵֽחַלְּל֔וֹ <WH2490> from polluting וּמַחֲזִיקִ֖ים <WH2388> it and taketh hold בִּבְרִיתִֽי׃ <WH1285> of my covenant

וַהֲבִיאוֹתִ֞ים <WH935> Even them will I bring אֶל־ <WH413> about הַ֣ר <WH2022> mountain קָדְשִׁ֗י <WH6944> to my holy וְשִׂמַּחְתִּים֙ <WH8055> and make them joyful בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in my house תְּפִלָּתִ֔י <WH8605> of prayer עוֹלֹתֵיהֶ֧ם <WH5930> their burnt offerings וְזִבְחֵיהֶ֛ם <WH2077> and their sacrifices לְרָצ֖וֹן <WH7522> [shall be] accepted עַֽל־ <WH5921> on מִזְבְּחִ֑י <WH4196> upon mine altar כִּ֣י <WH3588> For בֵיתִ֔י <WH1004> for mine house בֵּית־ <WH1004> an house תְּפִלָּ֥ה <WH8605> of prayer יִקָּרֵ֖א <WH7121> shall be called לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> for all people

נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> The Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD מְקַבֵּ֖ץ <WH6908> which gathereth נִדְחֵ֣י <WH1760> the outcasts יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel ע֛וֹד <WH5750> Yet אֲקַבֵּ֥ץ <WH6908> Yet will I gather עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> unto לְנִקְבָּצָֽיו׃ <WH6908> [others] to him beside those that are gathered

כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> All חַיְת֣וֹ <WH2416> All ye beasts שָׂדָ֑י <WH7704> of the field אֵתָ֕יוּ <WH857> come לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <WH398> to devour כָּל־ <WH3605> All חַיְת֖וֹ <WH2416> [yea] all ye beasts בַּיָּֽעַר׃ <WH3293> in the forest ס

[צָפוּ כ] (צֹפָ֞יו <WH6822> behold ק) עִוְרִ֤ים <WH5787> [are] blind כֻּלָּם֙ <WH3605> All לֹ֣א <WH3808> nothing יָדָ֔עוּ <WH3045> they are all ignorant כֻּלָּם֙ <WH3605> All כְּלָבִ֣ים <WH3611> dogs אִלְּמִ֔ים <WH483> they [are] all dumb לֹ֥א <WH3808> nothing יוּכְל֖וּ <WH3201> they cannot לִנְבֹּ֑חַ <WH5024> bark הֹזִים֙ <WH1957> sleeping שֹֽׁכְבִ֔ים <WH7901> lying down אֹהֲבֵ֖י <WH157> loving לָנֽוּם׃ <WH5123> to slumber

וְהַכְּלָבִ֣ים <WH3611> dogs עַזֵּי־ <WH5794> fierce נֶ֗פֶשׁ <WH5315> any לֹ֤א <WH3808> no יָֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> [which] can שָׂבְעָ֔ה <WH7646> have enough וְהֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> and they רֹעִ֔ים <WH7462> and they [are] shepherds לֹ֥א <WH3808> no יָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> never have הָבִ֑ין <WH995> [that] cannot understand כֻּלָּם֙ <WH3605> have all לְדַרְכָּ֣ם <WH1870> to their own way פָּנ֔וּ <WH6437> they all look אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one לְבִצְע֖וֹ <WH1215> for his gain מִקָּצֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7097> from his quarter

אֵתָ֥יוּ <WH857> Come אֶקְחָה־ <WH3947> ye [say they] I will fetch יַ֖יִן <WH3196> wine וְנִסְבְּאָ֣ה <WH5433> and we will fill שֵׁכָ֑ר <WH7941> ourselves with strong drink וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become כָזֶה֙ <WH2088> this י֣וֹם <WH3117> shall be as this day מָחָ֔ר <WH4279> and to morrow גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> abundant יֶ֥תֶר <WH3499> more מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> [and] much
